{{DISPLAYTITLE:A_NoGravity}} '''A_NoGravity'''
(no parameters)
Makes the calling actor not subject to gravity so it won't fall down anymore.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
== See also == *[[A_Gravity]] *[[A_LowGravity]] *[[A_SetGravity]]
{{DEFAULTSORT:NoGravity}}[[category:Decorate Status change functions]]
